Class: Arc

node-serialosc~ Arc

new Arc()

Handler for arc devices

Methods

addListeners()

Add prefix-based listeners
Called when the prefix is changed

all(n, l)

Set all leds on encoder n to level l

Parameters:
Name Type Description
n Number

encoder
l Number

level

map(n, levels)

Set leds on encoder n to levels array

Parameters:
Name Type Description
n Number

encoder
levels Number

array of 64 led levels

range(n, x1, x2, l)

Sets leds x1 through x2 to level l on encoder n

Parameters:
Name Type Description
n Number

encoder
x1 Number

start led
x2 Number

end led
l Number

level

removeListeners()

Remove existing prefix-based listeners
Called when the prefix is changed

set(data)

Set one led, data format is:
{n: encoder number, x: led number, l: led level}

Parameters:
Name Type Description
data Object

{n: encoder, x: led, l: level}
